Class Player

java.lang.Object
Game.Player
public class Player extends Object
Represents a player in the game, managing their hand, tokens, immunity, and other states. The Player class provides methods for interacting with the game's mechanics, such as drawing, discarding, and playing cards, as well as managing knock-out and immunity statuses.

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String nickname, Server.ConnectionHandler connectionHandler)
      Constructs a new Player with a given nickname and connection handler.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player
      connectionHandler - the connection handler associated with this player

  • Method Details

    • getHand

      public String getHand()
      Retrieves the player's hand as a formatted string.
      Returns:
      the player's hand in a string format

    • drawFirstCard

      public void drawFirstCard(Cards card)
      Draws the first card and adds it to the player's hand, notifying the player.
      Parameters:
      card - the card to add to the player's hand

    • drawCard

      public void drawCard(Cards card)
      Draws a card, handles special conditions for the Countess card, and sets the player’s turn. Removes immunity status for the current player.
      Parameters:
      card - the card to add to the player's hand

    • checkForCountessAndRoyal

      public boolean checkForCountessAndRoyal()
      Checks if the player's hand contains both the Countess and either the King or Prince. If this condition is met, the Countess is automatically played, and the turn ends.
      Returns:
      true if the Countess was played automatically; false otherwise.

    • discardCard

      public void discardCard(Cards card)
      Discards a specified card from the player's hand and adds it to the discarded cards list. Informs all players of the discarded card.
      Parameters:
      card - the card to discard

    • forceDiscardCard

      public void forceDiscardCard(Cards card)
      Forces the player to discard a specified card and adds it to the discarded cards list. Informs all players of the discarded card.
      Parameters:
      card - the card to discard

    • revealCard

      public void revealCard()
      Reveals the player's card to all players by discarding it.

    • gotKnockedOutOfRound

      public String gotKnockedOutOfRound()
      Marks the player as knocked out of the round and removes their current card if they have one.
      Returns:
      a string representing the discarded cards of the player

    • playCardGuard

      public void playCardGuard(int number, Player target)
      Plays the Guard card by applying its effect to the target player.
      Parameters:
      number - the number guessed by the Guard card
      target - the target player

    • playCardPriest

      public void playCardPriest(Player target)
      Plays the Priest card by applying its effect to the target player.
      Parameters:
      target - the target player

    • playCardBaron

      public void playCardBaron(Player target)
      Plays the Baron card by applying its effect to the target player.
      Parameters:
      target - the target player

    • playCardHandmaid

      public void playCardHandmaid()
      Plays the Handmaid card by applying its effect to make the player immune.

    • playCardPrince

      public void playCardPrince(Player target, Deck deck)
      Plays the Prince card by applying its effect to the target player and drawing a new card.
      Parameters:
      target - the target player
      deck - the deck from which to draw a new card

    • playCardKing

      public void playCardKing(Player target)
      Plays the King card by swapping cards with the target player.
      Parameters:
      target - the target player

    • playCardCountess

      public void playCardCountess()
      Plays the Countess card by discarding it.

    • playCardPrincess

      public void playCardPrincess()
      Plays the Princess card, causing the player to be knocked out if discarded.

    • findCardInHand

      private Cards findCardInHand(String cardName)
      Helper method to find a card in the player's hand by its name.
      Parameters:
      cardName - the name of the card to find
      Returns:
      the card with the specified name, or null if not found

    • playCardAllImmune

      public void playCardAllImmune(String c)
      Plays a specified card by discarding it without applying its effect.
      Parameters:
      cardName - the name of the card to play

    • getImmunePlayers

      public String getImmunePlayers()
      Retrieves a list of all players who are currently immune.
      Returns:
      a formatted string listing immune players

    • getKnockedOutOfRoundPlayers

      public String getKnockedOutOfRoundPlayers()
      Retrieves a list of all players who have been knocked out of the current round.
      Returns:
      a formatted string listing knocked-out players
